list.abs: 提喻（synecdoche）和借代（metonymy） 我分不清看了些例子也还是不清楚麻烦谁能举例详细说明区别谢谢啦最佳答案借代用中 …
...门酒肉奕，路有冻死骨(牡漪)放下屠刀，立地成佛四借代(synecdoche)英语借代(synecdoche)借代就是不直接说出所要表达的人或事 …

means.word_mean: 1. using the name of a part for that of the whole or the whole for the part; or the special for the general or the general for the special; or the material for the thing made of it;

sentences.sentence: "to use `hand' for `worker' or `ten sail' for `ten ships' or `steel' for `sword' is to use a synecdochic figure of speech"

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
